description:
[https://docs.sentry.io/api/projects/list-your-projects/](https://docs.sentry.io/api/projects/list-your-projects/)

Return a list of projects available to the authenticated session.

### Query Parameters:

`cursor` *(string)*

A pointer to the last object fetched and its sort order; used to retrieve the next or previous results.

### Scopes

You need to [authenticate via bearer auth token.](https://docs.sentry.io/api/auth) requires one of the following scopes:

*   `project:read`
